channel.title: Droidcon Berlin on Andy Dyer
channel.description: Recent content in Droidcon Berlin on Andy Dyer

item.title: Droidcon Berlin 2014: Froyo to KitKat
item.description: I'm thrilled to be speaking at Droidcon Berlin this year. I fell in love with the city on my first visit and the conference was a perfect reason for another visit. Attempts to try out my very basic German skills have shown me that I have a long way to go. However, I am proud to say that I have managed to make a few purchases without panicking and falling back to English.
